actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.
